Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2014 04:11PM - edited Dec 7, 2014 04:48PM by KGotThis Hi all :) I'm new to this blog. I am scheduled to finish chemotherapy on December 30th. This will be a New Year to remember for me! My oncologist wants me to meet with the radiation oncologist at the beginning of January for the initial consult. I've been told that I will "most likely" need 30 radiation treatments. How long have those of you who had chemo needed to wait before you could begin radiation? Thanks!
Posts.Title: Winter rads 2014-2015 ILCMom WndrWoman
